definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: Frame of the pistol is made from polymer.
sentences.chinese: 手枪的枪架是利用聚合物做成的。

sentences.english: Finally, MaXiao point to my pistol suddenly flip, pointing blade.
sentences.chinese: 终于，马啸指向本人的手枪忽然翻转，指向刀锋。

sentences.english: With the gun to Cao Hongyi's head to shoot off the sunspots.
sentences.chinese: 黑子用手枪指着曹弘毅的脑袋，做出要开枪的架势。

sentences.english: Mark twisted the gun from Don's hand with ungentle force.
sentences.chinese: 马克用不温和的力量拧来自君的手枪。

sentences.english: They had carried out their robbery with swords, blades and pistols.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经履行了其与剑，刀和手枪抢劫。

sentences.english: The witches are deadly nurses and Banquo is assassinated by handgun and silencer.
sentences.chinese: 女巫成了致命的护士，而班柯被消音手枪刺杀。

sentences.english: I see pictures of small pistols, and I hope, quick and painless.
sentences.chinese: 我看到小手枪，而且我真希望，干净利落，豪无痛苦。

sentences.english: Many people in America own handguns.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，许多人拥有手枪。

sentences.english: Musette bag with ammo, my webbing, my. 45, canteen…
sentences.chinese: 携物袋加预备弹药，我的伪装网，45手枪，水壶。

sentences.english: Marvin always carried a knife, never a gun.
sentences.chinese: 马文总是随身携带一把刀，从不带手枪。

sentences.english: The local farmers have armed themselves with rifles and pistols.
sentences.chinese: 当地农夫以来福枪及手枪来武装自己。

sentences.english: The original blade in early before they tick off pistol in last bullet.
sentences.chinese: 原来刀锋早在之前便偷换掉手枪里最后一颗子弹。

sentences.english: They wear ski masks and carry pistols and machine guns.
sentences.chinese: 他们戴着滑雪面具，携带手枪和冲锋枪。

sentences.english: The albino drew a pistol from his coat and aimed the barrel through the bars, directly at the curator.
sentences.chinese: 他从外套中拔出手枪，将枪管透过铁栏杆瞄准了馆长。

sentences.english: The pistol lay somewhere near them, perhaps found already.
sentences.chinese: 手枪就在离他们不远的地方，也许早已被发现。

sentences.english: Geoffrey reached beneath his frock and produced two pistols.
sentences.chinese: 杰弗里伸向他的法衣内并掏出两把手枪。

definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
rifle (loanword)/also written 來復槍|来复枪
